entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.30.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

Booklore gets even more powerful and reliable! - You can now explicitly clear metadata fields, allowing you to remove outdated or incorrect information easily. - Metadata can be written directly into your PDF files, making your file information self-contained and improving compatibility with other readers and tools. - Fixed data consistency and selection bugs in the PrimeNG table to ensure smoother interactions, and made sure selected books are cleared properly after assigning them to shelves.

🚀 Features

  • Allow metadata fields to be explicitly cleared (#599) by @adityachandelgit
  • Support writing metadata directly into PDF files (#588) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Resolve data consistency and selection issues in PrimeNG p-table (#601) by @adityachandelgit
  • Clear selected books after assigning to a shelf (#590) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for release (#602) by @adityachandelgit
  • Carify max upload size note to indicate restart is required (#589) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.32.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

This release introduces two major improvements: - Powerful File Move Support: You can now move or reorganize your book files using customizable patterns based on metadata (e.g., title, author, series). This gives you full control over your library’s structure with just a few clicks. - Fully Refactored Library Monitoring: The file monitoring system has been rebuilt from the ground up for accuracy and reliability. Booklore now consistently detects new, updated, or moved files, no more missed updates! - Freshly Redesigned Login Screen: The authentication pages have been completely revamped with modern styling, gradient backgrounds, and a cleaner layout.

🚀 New Features

  • Support File Move Operations with Watcher Refactor for Accurate Tracking (#645) by @adityachandelgit

✨ Enhancements

  • Display first book in series when collapsed (#641) by @adityachandelgit
  • Improve Aesthetics of Login and Admin Setup Views (#649) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Fix Transaction Deadlock During Library Re-Scan Due to Duplicates (#647) by @adityachandelgit
